mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL - 1 AS space, category_code, category_name, parent_category_code, category_photo FROM tb_category START WITH parent_category_code = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR category_code = parent_category_code ORDER SIBLINGS BY category_code

SELECT sys_connect_by_path(category_name, '/') category FROM tb_category WHERE connect_by_isleaf = 1 AND category_code = #{catCode} START WITH parent_category_code = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR category_code = parent_category_code
